summary: Experienced Technical Project Manager with a strong background in business analysis, technical channel enablement, and solutions engineering. Proven ability to manage complex projects, exceed sales targets, and build strategic partnerships. Skilled in delivering technical presentations, influencing product roadmaps, and innovating solutions.

duties: Managed and executed complex technical partner enablement programs, influencing product roadmaps and providing technical expertise.
Conducted engaging training exercises to equip teams with necessary knowledge and skills.
Developed comprehensive go-to-market plans in collaboration with Strategic Partner Managers.
Successfully led and executed technical projects, achieving 100+% of sales goals with each aligned Account Executive.
Provided tailored pre-sales solutions and technical presentations, addressing customer business problems.
Collaborated with the sales team to understand customer requirements and design effective solutions.
Delivered technical presentations and demonstrations to showcase the features and benefits of the company's products.
Provided technical support and guidance to customers during the pre-sales process.

jobTitles: Technical Account Manager / Customer Success Manager
Channel Partner Manager / Strategic Partner Manager
